participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a passion for music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I'm still a student, but I'm gonna be a nurse. My horse never talks back to me. I enjoy Budweiser beer. I'm the lead singer for an indie band. I live in the city.

participant_2.name: Akira
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and determined, with a love for languages and cultures.
participant_2.background: I'm tired of having to read subtitles. I like to watch Japanese cartoons anime in my free time. Our class is planning a trip to Japan. I hope to save enough money for it. I started learning Japanese at college.

content.text: I'm a big fan of anime too! What's your favorite show?
I really like One Piece. It's a long series, but it's so good.
I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really funny and the characters are great.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a translator. I'm learning Japanese in college and I hope to go to Japan one day.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit Japan too.
Me too! I think it would be so cool to experience the culture and see all the beautiful sights.
I bet it would. Have you been saving up for the trip?
I'm trying, but it's hard to save money as a student.
I know what you mean. I'm a student too.
Maybe we can go on a trip together one day.
That would be fun! I'd love to travel with you.
Great! We can start planning our trip now.
